text: Rodrigo José Ramón Francisco de Jesús Carazo Odio (27 December 1926 - 9 December 2009) was a Costa Rican politician. He was the President of Costa Rica from 8 May 1978 to 8 May 1982.El Tribunal Supremo de Elecciones: Presidentes de la República de Costa Rica ==References== ==Other websites== * Carazo and his relations with FARC Colombia Category:1926 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Presidents of Costa Rica
title: Rodrigo Carazo Odio
